text: Apparently Jennifer Lopez is enjoying Drake lamenting losing her in his new track! Here ’ s all the EXCLUSIVE details! Lo, ” he raps on his new track “ Diplomatic Immunity. ” Whoa! But honestly, it ’ s hard to believe anyone would let J. Lo get away!
